articles.title: Brittney Griner has been sent to a Russian penal colony to serve her sentence, lawyers say - CBC Sports
articles.description: American basketball star Brittney Griner has been sent to a penal colony in Russia to serve her sentence for drug possession, her legal team said Wednesday. A Russian court rejected an appeal of her nine-year sentence last month.
articles.content:
